title: Businessweek Extra - Lonne Jaffe on Automation
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Lonne Jaffe on Automation
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Lonne Jaffe, Insight Venture Partners Managing Director, about how some of the smartest machines around are actually job-creators.

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
